name: Lightning Reflexes
text: You have faster reflexes than normal.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Reflex saving throws.
mythicBenefit: Whenever you roll a Reflex saving throw against a spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural ability from a non-mythic source, roll twice and take the higher result.
text_zh: 你的反应力比一般人快。
benefit_zh: 所有反射豁免获得+2加值。
mythicBenefit_zh: 每当你在对抗由非神话来源产生的法术、类法术能力或者超自然能力的反射豁免时，做两次检定并取较高结果。
